parameters.name: Describe
parameters.description: The description of the data export rule.

parameters.name: DstNames
parameters.description: The destination to which the data is exported. Valid values of N: 1 to 20.

parameters.name: MetricName
parameters.description:
The name of the metric.

> 

For more information, see [Appendix 1: Metrics](~~163515~~).

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The namespace of the cloud service.

> For more information, see [Appendix 1: Metrics](~~163515~~).

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description:
The name of the rule.

> If the specified rule exists, the existing rule is modified. Otherwise, a rule is created.

parameters.name: TargetWindows
parameters.description:
The time window of the exported data. Unit: seconds.

> 

*   Separate multiple time windows with commas (,).

*   Data in a time window of less than 60 seconds cannot be exported.
